channel.title: Topic 04: Optimization Part 2 on Introduction to Machine Learning (I2ML)
channel.description: Recent content in Topic 04: Optimization Part 2 on Introduction to Machine Learning (I2ML)

item.title: Chapter 04.01: Challenges in Optimization
item.description: In this section, we summarize several of the most prominent challenges regarding training of deep neural networks such as Ill-Conditioning Local Minima, Saddle Points, Cliffs and Exploding Gradients.

item.title: Chapter 04.02: Measures Regression
item.description: In this section we introduce several advanced techniques for optimization of neural network such as learning rate schedules, adaptive learning rates, and batch normalization.

item.title: Chapter 04.03: Modern Activation Functions
item.description: We explain challenges in optimization related to action function and introduce activation for hidden and output units.

item.title: Chapter 04.04: Network Initialization
item.description: This part describe why initialization is important and explain weight and bias initialization.
